1.title: Skovturen
1.plot: Its autumn and Rita and Crocodile go to collect conkers in the forest. Rita admonishes Crocodile to stay on the track in order not to get lost. But looking at all the glittering conker she forgets everything and becomes lost herself.

2.title: Fisketuren
2.plot: Rita and Crocodile are going fishing, and Rita lectures Crocodile on how to fish. At the lake, however, it is Crocodile who catches all the fish, even though Rita has the new fishing rod and gave Crocodile the old one. Rita wants to trade, but that doesn't help. Rita is determined to catch a fish, and she carries on even though it starts raining. At last she catches one big fish. It's fish for dinner. Rita's big fish and all Crocodile's fish.

3.title: Camping
3.plot: Rita and Crocodile are going camping. It is cosy inside the tent on the mountain - until it becomes dark. The moon casts shadows that look like witches and trolls on the canvas. Rita asks Crocodile to go out to scare them away.

4.title: Pindsvinet
4.plot: Rita and Crocodile want their own pet, and there lives a hedgehog in Grandmas garden. So they must stay awake very late order to catch it. Rita falls asleep and when she wakes up, the milk is gone.

5.title: Snevejr
5.plot: It has snowed. Rita and Crocodile go out to sledge. On the hill they meet Boris who challenges them to race. But the hill is steep and Rita is scared. She blames Crocodile and tells him to get off her sledge.

6.title: Zoologisk Have
6.plot:

imdb.plot outline: Rita is 4 years old, very determined and used to getting things her way. She has a very hungry friend, Crocodile, who lives in the bathtub. Most probably, Crocodile only exists in Rita's imagination, but in the films we see the world through Rita's eyes, and Rita believes in Crocodile.
imdb.title: Rita og Krokodille
plot: Rita is 4 years old, very determined and used to getting things her way. She has a very hungry friend, Crocodile, who lives in the bathtub. Most probably, Crocodile only exists in Rita's imagination, but in the films we see the world through Rita's eyes, and Rita believes in Crocodile.::Marie Bro
synopsis:
Rita is 4 years old, very determined and used to getting things her way. She has a very hungry friend, Crocodile, who lives in the bathtub. Most probably, Crocodile only exists in Rita's imagination, but in the films we see the world through Rita's eyes, and Rita believes in Crocodile. When Crocodile is around, Rita can go where ever she wants into the forest, on vacation, to the mountains or out fishing. Most often Rita and Crocodile are out exploring nature and being outside is a central part of the series. There are incredibly many things Rita wants to see and thinks she knows but less she actually manages to do. In her own humorous and naive way she learns about herself and about small and big things in the world around her without adult guidance. Crocodile helps Rita to find creative and funny solutions to her challenges without ever becoming didactic, and Rita always achieves her goal with Crocodile by her side. The friendship between Rita and Crocodile has both conflicts and feelings which small children will recognise.
The films are most basically about being 4 years of age and the guiding theme is the friendship between Rita and Crocodile.
